thread.title: Shoplifter flees police: Lakewood police blotter

title: Shoplifter flees police: Lakewood police blotter
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: Crime - Today 
A police cruiser pursued the shoplifter after he left the store in a car, but the chase was called off over safety concerns....
